As the school year wraps up (just a few more weeks to go), the bittersweet season begins. Some students I've worked with, I will see again in the Fall. Other students are moving on. I'm so proud of them, but the goodbyes have begun and my heart needs extra hugs right now.

It's never easy to watch my team lose, regardless of which sport I'm cheering for. Let the teasing and disrespect come. I'm loyal. No amount of trash talking or put-downs can dissuade me from that. I'm fiercely loyal. And I'll ALWAYS love and rep MY city. https://t.co/27phVje4KQ

@Sukiestyles I'm thinking the only way to find out is if me, you, and @kellymasumiya sneak into the gala one of these days. I'm sure we can all fit under someone's extravagant train. If we get caught, our cover is a photographer and two assistants. We got this!

My Mommy and I have been addicted to ice skating and ice dancing since our family moved to Canada in 1991. I didn't know when she would be free to talk so I just texted. Her response was the cutest. We love you @elvisstojko!! https://t.co/3uwNIkeai0
@laurenhummfries Thoughts when you're done!!
RT @KeoneMadrid: These first bits of reviews from those who finished already. THANK YOU LILY ðŸ˜­ And yes, guys... We created the story togethâ€¦
RT @KeoneMadrid: @bits_o_Love @_marimadrid Oh man I replied to soon and just saw this haha. THANK YOU. So happy you enjoyed it. If you haveâ€¦
RT @KeoneMadrid: @bits_o_Love @_marimadrid Thank YOU Lily. Youâ€™ve always been so supportive to us and dance art in general. Grateful to havâ€¦

@KeoneMadrid @_marimadrid Left a review and rated it as well. I've already re-read it and re-watched again in its entirety. It's incredible and I'm so happy that you two get to share your heART like this. Here's to more dreams coming true!! God bless.

I just finished your labour of love @KeoneMadrid and @_marimadrid. Mari, your words flowed so seamlessly and beautifully off the pages. This was such a emotionally stunning marriage of word, sound, movement, art...immersive. Thank you.
@Freakin_Dani Love you!! Congrats on this huge milestone.
@Freakin_Dani This is amazing!! What a happy day. You're making me cry over here ðŸ’œ

Spotted: @Ian_Eastwood in the first chapter of Ruth. There are seriously so many people from the dance community who gathered for @KeoneMadrid and @_marimadrid. I knew this Lion would be one of them. Always elevating dance and creativity in all its forms.

Currently reading through this amazing dancebook and can't help but be overwhelmed with emotion. What an incredible journey this has been. Thank you for this art @KeoneMadrid and @_marimadrid. Proud to be one of your 904. https://t.co/ayGZ1LajDN

I don't usually know when my knowledge of vein and heart health will ever come into play. I just try to make with nurse @yvettefaye laugh at the most inopportune times.
